long_description: This winter, keep your feet warm heel to toe with these Grabber foot warmers. To use, simply open a packet-contents are air-activated, providing heat for up to 5 hrs. Made of environmentally safe, non-toxic materials; ingredients include iron, water, cellulose, vermiculite, activated carbon and salt. Disposable pads are designed for 1-time use. Available in 2 sizes: S/M fits women's shoe size 5 - 8 and men's 4 - 7; M/L footbed fits women's shoe size 9 and above and men's 8 and above. Package contains 1 pair of Grabber foot warmers (1 left and 1 right). *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This winter, keep your feet warm heel to toe with these Grabber foot warmers.
